finalFeedback.textNeeded: Well done, you have completed this interaction.

question.p: Orang yang dicari harus bersifat disiplin.

feedback.p: The person who is sought (by an unnamed person/company) must have a disciplined nature.
I am a person who can be relied on (by others – this is why it is third person).

question.p: Pelanggan yang dilayani kebanyakannya orang asing.

feedback.p: The customers who are served are mostly foreigners.

question.p: Biasanya, Anda harus diwawancarai sebelum mendapat pekerjaan.

feedback.p: Usually, you have to be interviewed (by someone) before getting a job.
